title: Cannot add several payloads to fuzzer (NullPointerException)

milestone.description: Enhancements and bug fixes expected to be included in the next main release.

body:
Hi,

So here is what I do (using ZAP_D-2016-03-07):
- Create a new Fuzzer for a POST request
- Add a location from the URL
- Add a payload (e.g. strings)
- Try to add a second payload

-> NullPointerException

Running on Ubuntu 15.10, 

> $ java -version
> java version "1.7.0_95"
> OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea 2.6.4) (7u95-2.6.4-0ubuntu0.15.10.1)
> OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 24.95-b01, mixed mode)

Since I only just recently switched to using i3wm as my window manager, I also tried Unity, just to be sure, but the effect is the same.

Below are top few lines of the stack trace.

Please let me know if you need any further information.

Thanks,

Roland

> 71004 [AWT-EventQueue-1] ERROR org.zaproxy.zap.ZAP$UncaughtExceptionLogger  - Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-1"
> java.lang.NullPointerException
>   at org.zaproxy.zap.view.JCheckBoxTree$CheckBoxCellRenderer.getTreeCellRendererComponent(JCheckBoxTree.java:168)

>   at org.zaproxy.zap.view.JCheckBoxTree.collapseAll(JCheckBoxTree.java:316)
>   at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.fuzz.FuzzerPayloadGeneratorUIHandler$FuzzerPayloadGeneratorUIPanel.resetFileFuzzersCheckBoxTree(FuzzerPayloadGeneratorUIHandler.java:417)
